examples.text: you calculate the net chargeable gain for the period

definitions: (of a sum of money) required to be paid

examples.text: interest is chargeable at a basic rate of 25 percent

definitions: (of an offense) subject by law to a formal accusation; illegal
shortDefinitions: (of offence) subject by law to formal accusation

definitions: (of a battery or battery-operated device) able to have its electrical energy restored by connection to a power supply

examples.text: the motor is chargeable via a micro-USB connection

shortDefinitions: (of battery) able to have electrical energy restored by connection to power supply
